CustomObject.label: Twilio Configuration
CustomObject.description: Custom metadata storing Twilio SMS provider configuration settings for onboarding SMS communications. Contains Twilio account credentials, phone numbers, and named credential references used by follow-up messaging services. Example: A Twilio_Configuration metadata record with DeveloperName__c="Primary_Twilio_Account" might have Account_SID__c="AC1234567890", From_Phone_Number__c="+15551234567", and Named_Credential__c="Twilio_API". When Follow_Up_Rule__mdt records specify SMS follow-ups (Follow_Up_Type__c="SMS"), the messaging service references this configuration to authenticate with Twilio and send SMS messages. Multiple configurations can exist for different Twilio accounts (e.g., primary, backup, region-specific), allowing flexible SMS routing. Active__c flag controls which configurations are available for use.
